document_data.name: Thundercall
document_data.mainbody: The '''Thundercall''' were an [[orc]] tribe who lived in the [[Far Horns Forest]] during the time of [[Netheril]].
document_data.History: The Thundercall tribe lived in the northern Far Horns, and were famed for sounding their warhorns in order to instill fear in their enemies before battle. Once the [[Netherese]] city of [[Unity]] was founded in {{yearlinkConvert|614|NY}}, however, they weren't able to dominate the forest as they once had and were kept on the backfoot.
